item.title: Imposter syndrome? Try blogging!
item.description: Photo by J. Kelly Brito on Unsplash I absolutely love to learn new things. Whether itâ€™s something to advance my career (scrum master training), personal development (blogging), or just a fun hobby (motorcycling). But, sometimes I seem to somewhat suffer from Imposter Syndrome. Especially at work or when listening to technical talks. I canâ€™t help but have the feeling that Iâ€™m lacking knowledge and that I donâ€™t know nearly enough to properly do my job.

item.title: Actix.rs - a newbie's perspective
item.description: Photo by James Harrison on Unsplash These days the Rust programming language seems to be everywhere you go online. In fact, the Rust language was rated as one of the most loved languages by the community in the 2020 StackOverflow developer survey! I often tend to stay away from hypes and new languages, but the amount of engineers praising Rust has grown significantly over the years. So much that I just had to check it out myself!
